import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; class ResourceManager extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { columns: [{ "header": "ID", "name": "id" }, { "header": "NAME", "name": "name" }, { "header": "Start Date","name": "startDate" }, { "header": "End Date", "name": "endDate" }], showAdd: false, showUpdate: false, showDelete: false, showRM:true, name: null, startDate: null, endDate: null } this.handleAdd = this.handleAdd.bind(this); this.handleUpdate = this.handleUpdate.bind(this); this.handleDelete = this.handleDelete.bind(this); this.handleClose = this.handleClose.bind(this); this.handleSubmitAdd = this.handleSubmitAdd.bind(this); this.handleSubmitUpdate = this.handleSubmitUpdate.bind(this); } handleAdd(event) { this.setState({ showAdd: true, showDelete: false, showUpdate: false, showRM: false }) } handleUpdate(event) { this.setState({ showUpdate: true, showAdd: false, showDelete: false, showRM: false }) } handleDelete(event) { this.setState({ showDelete: true, showAdd: false, showUpdate: false, showRM: false }) } handleClose(event) { this.setState({ showUpdate: false, showDelete: false, showAdd: false, showRM: false }) } render() { console.log(this.props); return (
{this.state.columns.map(col => )} {this.props.rows.map(row => {this.state.columns.map(col => )} )}
{col.header}
{row[col.name]}
Update Resource Manager
Delete New Resource Manager
Add New Resource Manager
); } } export default ResourceManager;
